Reviews.Title: “Great location & friendly hotel.”
Reviews.Author: Mike M
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel 4 nights march 2012 situated 5 minutes stroll zoologischer garten train station access berlin direct train link airport hotel clean staff superb visit spoke excellent english breakfast included scrambled eggs bacon cold meats cheeses cereals fruits etc comfortable cleaned daily free safe free wifi hotel bonus hotel located close savignyplatz barscafes restaurants recommend bar selection beers local pub food travel berlin bonus recommend purchasing welcome card ticket access trains trams buses 25 discount attractions restaurants hotel doesnt own restaurant sister hotels restaurant resident astoria 10 discount 25 welcome card completely safe walking times included coming 1am night booked direct hotel via website offers ie stay 4 nights pay 3 cost 240 euros 4 nights including breakfast instead 320 approx £200 definitely return visit berlin

Reviews.Title: “Top Notch”
Reviews.Author: sasquatch27
Reviews.Content: hotel astoria located kurfurstendam close shopping transit bus airport stops corner ubahn equally close sbahn short 10min walk savignyplatz restaurants nearby located distinct requiring stairs combined elevators european standards hotel astoria value internet functioned breakfast check check properly handled surprises hotel return charm convienient location

Reviews.Title: “Good location”
Reviews.Author: Carina H
Reviews.Content: stayed april 2011 five days time stayed kurfuerstendamm proved ideal location close public transports clean beds comfortable found hotel staff friendly helpful breakfast surprisingly dining bit remember inform hotel nonsmoking forgot professional solved

Reviews.Title: “Nice little hotel”
Reviews.Author: andand49
Reviews.Content: astoria hotel situated quiet surroundings 5 10 minutes walk shopping near direction plenty restaurants savignyplatz medium size equipped 3 star hotel clean repair hotel easy arrive berlin via tegel airport bus x9 stops att zoo railway station 5 minutes walk definitely recommend hotel hotel bar restaurant risk hungry thirsty lots bars restaurants neighborhood

Reviews.Title: “Sehr gut”

Reviews.Content: nice hotel spacious sized bathroom shower curtain breakfast staff excellent direct nearest laundromat own location near train station tourist sites grocery wine stores restaurants shopping close negative charge internet service website led believe included price

Reviews.Title: “Best Hotel at the price”

Reviews.Content: travel times hotel definitely price booked hotel 3 days price 2 days staff friendly breakfast location close zoo shower hotel family 4 people 2 regular beds issue hard uncomfortable top nice hotel recommendation

Reviews.Title: “Friendly staff and nice hotel”
Reviews.Author: mauricgn
Reviews.Content: spent days nice hotel located central spacious breakfast reasonable choice prepared food staff helpful situation thank help missed luggage berlin airport hope soon

Reviews.Title: “Reasonable hotel - does the basics well enough”
Reviews.Author: drsoong
Reviews.Content: stayed 3 nights october 2010 conference id straight bruges stayed posher hotel maybe expectations set found astoria posh actually theres wrong doesnt shine mainly slightly odd shape thin due location corridor floor space suitcase worst bit thin bed single thin duvet bigger proverbial postage stamp teacoffee sort expect nowadays unless youre real budget dont falls theres nice lcd tv bbc world cnbc english language plus clever internet facilities didnt bought inroom wifi access 12 euro 24 hours buy 2 hours 10 euro thats worth cheaper lobby access theres space sit staff friendly helpful particularly chap checked evening arrived happy chat free beer bar id booked via website location im didnt chance explore berlin conference unfortunately impression tourist sights bus underground ride eg brandenburg gate east berlin shopping centres hotel nice vietnamese restaurant walking distance zoological gardens underground station 5 mins walk major interchange underground lines station bit dodgy hang particularly night didnt trouble bit uncomfortable breakfast nice choices cereal fruits yogurts cold meats cheeses breads hot platter bacon scrambled boiled eggs fill stay cant complain try hence question recommending friend

Reviews.Title: “Excellent hotel - Excellent location”

Reviews.Content: close bahnhof zoo connections train underground supermarket nearby everyday 10 pm hotel clean bed comfy shower window staff nice helpful breakfast lots variety included price start day defenately recommend hotel
